Legal_Issue: Denial of procedural fairness in spousal sponsorship application
Procedural_Context: Separate spousal interviews without opportunity to respond
Credibility_Assessment: Contradictions in spousal interviews raised credibility concerns
Evidence_Type: Extrinsic evidence, interview transcripts, negative file information
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to allow applicant to address contradictions and negative information
Review_Outcome: Remanded for redetermination with procedural safeguards
Assessment_Standard: Opportunity to respond to adverse information
Evidence_Ignored: Negative file information not disclosed or addressed
Decision_Review_Issue: Use of undisclosed evidence and lack of response opportunity
Cause_of_Refusal: Insufficient humanitarian and compassionate grounds; procedural unfairness
Evidentiary_Issues: Use of extrinsic evidence without disclosure

Procedural_Issue: Lack of opportunity to respond to adverse information
